tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE vendor_relationships (
    vendor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vendor_name VARCHAR(255),
    contact_person VARCHAR(255),
    contact_email VARCHAR(255),
    compliance_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE vendor_relationships (
    vendor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vendor_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    contact_name VARCHAR(255),
    contact_email VARCHAR(255),
    procurement_policy_compliance BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE vendor_compliance (
    compliance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vendor_id INT,
    policy_id INT,
    date_checked DATE,
    passed_compliance BOOLEAN,
    FOREIGN KEY (vendor_id) REFERENCES vendor_details(vendor_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (policy_id) REFERENCES procurement_policies(policy_id)
);

CREATE TABLE vendor_relationships (
    vendor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vendor_name VARCHAR(255),
    contact_name VARCHAR(255),
    contact_email VARCHAR(255),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE contracts (
    contract_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vendor_id INT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    total_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    FOREIGN KEY (vendor_id) REFERENCES vendors(vendor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE procurement_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    action VARCHAR(50),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    user_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);
